subject: Dogfighting
lead_paragraph: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — The jailed quarterback Michael Vick can keep all but $3.75 million of the nearly $20 million in bonus money he received from the Atlanta Falcons after a ruling Monday by a federal judge.
snippet: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — The jailed quarterback Michael Vick can keep all but $3.75 million of the nearly $20 million in bonus money he received from the Atlanta Falcons after a ruling Monday by a federal judge.
